data.title: Fred Merle Nottingham (1920-1992)
data.meta_description: Is this your ancestor? Explore genealogy for Fred Merle Nottingham born 1920 Marion, Center Township, Grant County, Indiana, United States died 1992 Nokomis, Sarasota County, Florida, United States including research + more in the free family tree community.
data.text:
Son of [father unknown] and [mother unknown]

[sibling(s) unknown]

[children unknown]

Problems/Questions

Profile last modified 21 Dec 2023

This page has been accessed 41 times.

Biography

Fred Merle Nottingham is a Military Veteran.

Served in the United States Army 1941-

Army Air Force World War II

Fredrick, son of Chester Brubaker & Cecile Ann Nattingbam, was born on 8 February 1920 in Orpland, Grant, Indiana, United States.[1]

Fred was in a military record on 1 July 1941 in Muncie, Delaware, Indiana, United States.[2]

Fred was in a military record on 16 October 1941 in Fort Benjamin Harrison, Indiana. Their service number was 15082156.[3]

Fred (age 25), son of H J Nottingham & Cecille A Wall, married Janette Hall on 14 April 1945 in Indiana, United States.[4]

In the 1950 census Fred (age 30), Manager, was the married head of household in Dunkirk, Jay, Indiana, United States.[5]

Name Sex Age Status Relation Occupation Birth Place Fred M Nattingham M 30 Married Head Manager Indiana Janette Nattingham F 26 Married Wife Kentucky Michael Nattingham M 3 Never married Son Indiana Patricia Nattingham F 1 Never married Daughter Indiana

Fred married Nellie Jean Privett on 8 January 1983 in Sarasota, Florida, United States.[6]

Fred died (age 72) on 23 November 1992 in Sarasota, Florida, United States.[7]

Fred was mentioned on a memorial in Earlham Cemetery, Richmond, Wayne County, Indiana, United States with a death date of 23 November 1992.[8]

Fred was in a Social Security record on 23 November 1992.[9]
